cz.ive.gui
Class AnimatedGraphicInfo

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.gui.AbstractGraphicInfo
      cz.ive.gui.AnimatedGraphicInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphicInfo, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActorGraphicInfo
public class AnimatedGraphicInfo
extends AbstractGraphicInfo

Implementation of the GraphicInfo specialized for viewing objects depending on the value of a particular attribute.

Author:
ondra
See Also:

Constructor Detail

AnimatedGraphicInfo

public AnimatedGraphicInfo(IveObject object,
                           GraphicTemplate template)
Creates a new instance of AnimatedGraphicInfo. This method affects given IveObject by setting up its GraphicInfo.

Parameters:
object - IveObject we should be associted with.
template - Graphic template that will be used for rendering.

getBoundingBox

public java.awt.Rectangle getBoundingBox(Viewpoint view,
                                         java.awt.Point offset)
Description copied from interface: GraphicInfo
Retrieves bounding box of this object in given Viewpoint. The bounding box should be offseted by a give vector.

Specified by:

Parameters:
view - Graphical viewpoint associated with the calling GUI

Returns:
rectangular bounding box of this object

draw

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics2D canvas,
                 Viewpoint view,
                 java.awt.Point offset)
Description copied from interface: GraphicInfo
Draws object on the given canvas using a viewpoint for correct position and scale retrieval. The drawing should be offseted by a given vector.

Specified by:
draw in interface GraphicInfo
Overrides:
draw in class AbstractGraphicInfo
Parameters:
canvas - graphical canvas where to draw the object
view - graphical viewpoint associted with the calling GUI
offset - drawing offset
